block.p: A free tasting of European beers, with hors d'oeuvres, will be held tomorrow at 5:30 p.m. at Bayard's, 1 Hanover Square (Pearl Street).

A four-course Indian dinner prepared by the author Madhur Jaffrey will follow chamber music performed by Clarion Concerts of Columbia County, Saturday evening at 7, at Hillsdale Grange, Route 22, Hillsdale, N.Y. Proceeds will benefit the performing group. Tickets, $100: (518) 325-3805.

See a Little, Eat a Little

The Lower East Side Conservancy will offer three-hour tours and traditional food tastings at three historic synagogues on Sunday, at 11:30 a.m. and 12:15 and 1 p.m. Tours are $21 each; $18 for students: (212) 598-1200.
